GLfloat  shadow_intensity,
int  type,
bool  shadow 
)

Set light shadow.

Parameters:
shadow_size shadow map size (must be power of two)
shadow_intensity mixing intensity (0 - transparent, 1 - opaque)
type light type (spot or omni)
shadow shadows on/off
